Title: That Is Not Miami
Writer: Douglas Adams (based upon the novels by), Max Landis (created for television by), Molly Nussbaum, Sinead Daly (executive story editor), Molly Nussbaum (story editor)
Actors: Samuel Barnett, Elijah Wood, Hannah Marks, Amanda Walsh
Plot: Todd looks for Amanda in Wendimore while Dirk wallows in self pity. Amanda tries to avoid the impending bloodshed that she has foreseen between the Wendimore clans and Suzie Boreton arrives to take over for The Mage.
